results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ግን (ቁርኣኑ በመጣላቸው ጊዜ) በእርሱ ካዱ፡፡ ወደፊትም በእርግጥ ያውቃሉ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: (የእርዳታ) ቃላችንም መልክተኞች ለሆኑት ባሮቻችን በእውነት አልፋለች፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከእነርሱም (ከመካ ከሓዲዎች) እስከ ጥቂት ጊዜ ድረስ ዙር (ተዋቸው)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
